name: DESFERAL 0.5 G.
treatmentDescriptions: Treatment of chronic iron overload  e.g.: Transfusional haemosiderosis especially in thalassaemia major  sideroblastic anaemia  autoimmune haemolytic anaemia and other chronic anaemias  Idiopathic (primary) haemochromatosis in patients in whom concomitant disorders ( e.g. severe anaemia  cardiac disease  hypoproteinaemia) preclude phlebotomy  Iron overload associated with porphyria cutanea tarda. Treatment of acute iron poisoning. Treatment of chronic aluminium overload in patients with terminal renal failure (under maintenance dialysis) with: aluminium-related bone disease  and/or dialysis encephalopathy  and/or aluminium-related anaemia. Diagnosis of iron overload.
warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לרישום ע'י רופא מומחה או הגבלה אחרת
